questions.question: Following Giorgio Armani's recent death, where did the Armani Group say a public chamber/wake would be set up?

answers.text: Teatro Armani at the company's Milan headquarters

questions.explanation: The Armani Group announced a public funeral chamber/wake would be held at its Milan headquarters — Teatro Armani — with a private funeral to follow, according to Australian coverage of Giorgio Armani's death.

questions.question: Following Melbourne University Publishing's announcement that Meanjin will cease publication, which staff did reports say were made redundant?

answers.text: MUP chair Professor Warren Bebbington and a senior manager
Two full-time production staff at Melbourne University Publishing
Editor Esther Anatolitis and deputy editor Eli McLean
The magazine's long-standing fiction editor and poetry editor

questions.explanation: Australian reporting states that two part-time Meanjin staff were made redundant: editor Esther Anatolitis and deputy editor Eli McLean. (Some outlets — for example the Guardian story originally cited — mention two part-time staff and name Anatolitis but do not name McLean; Australian coverage such as Crikey and industry statements name both individuals.)

questions.question: In ABC's report on the recent Marinus Link financing milestone, how much concessional loan (A$) did the Clean Energy Finance Corporation (CEFC) agree to provide to lock the project in?
questions.explanation: The ABC article (3 Sept 2025) and the CEFC media release report the CEFC agreed to provide A$3.8 billion in concessional finance (the CEFC describes this as an expected commitment and notes it is inclusive of capitalised interest during construction).

questions.question: At the US Open, world No. 1 and defending champion Aryna Sabalenka beat Jessica Pegula in the women's semifinal to reach the final. How many winners did Sabalenka finish with in that match (match total)?
questions.explanation: Official match statistics list Sabalenka with 43 winners (and 8 aces) in the 4–6, 6–3, 6–4 semifinal win over Jessica Pegula.

questions.question: Following the Armani Group's announcement of his death, how old was Italian fashion designer Giorgio Armani?
questions.explanation: The Armani Group announced Giorgio Armani's passing and Australian coverage (ABC News and others) reported he died aged 91.
